snippet: A particularly aggressive strain of honeybee has been menacing parts of Arizona in recent weeks, with some people getting stung so many times that they have been hospitalized.
abstract: Africanized honeybee, or so-called killer bee, is tormenting many parts of Arizona, stinging scores of people with such severity that they have had to be hospitalized.
lead_paragraph: A particularly aggressive strain of honeybee has been menacing parts of Arizona in recent weeks, with some people getting stung so many times that they have been hospitalized.
